title: Can anyone identify this font for me?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081017155120im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Font_4685.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081017155120/http:/typophile.com/files/Font_12.jpg) | 13.63 KB |

 [‹ What's this slab serif?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081017155120/http:/typophile.com/node/50465 "Go to previous forum topic") [I would like to know the font in this picture ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081017155120/http:/typophile.com/node/50460 "Go to next forum topic")
author: gumby43

comments.content: No, but I can offer three alternatives: [Freehand 521](http://web.archive.org/web/20081017155120/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/bitstream/freehand_521_regular_ot/?sample_text=Coffee&sample_size=96) [,](http://web.archive.org/) [Kinescope](http://web.archive.org/web/20081017155120/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/mark_simonson/kinescope/?sample_text=Coffee&sample_size=96), [Fenway Park](http://web.archive.org/web/20081017155120/http:/www.veer.com/partner/link.aspx?i=1048&c=4&p=products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0000019).
